definitions.text: a vessel (usually cylindrical) with a wide mouth and without handles
the quantity contained in a jar
examples: he drank a jar of beer
the door closed with a jolt
all the jars and jolts were smoothed out by the shock absorbers

definitions.text: be incompatible; be or come into conflict
move or cause to move with a sudden jerky motion

examples: Georgia was shaken up in the Tech game
